|blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267267 |website = |footnotes = }} Arlington is a city in Brookings and Kingsbury counties in the State of South Dakota. The population was 915 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Cities in South Dakota
